overview: BTS Memories of 2020 DVD depicts glorious moments of BTS in the year of 2020. Those moments when BTS and ARMY were mentally e spiritually together even when physically apart: 'MAP OF THE SOUL:7', 'Dynamite', 'BE', 'BANG BANG CON The Live' which spearheaded a new cultural phenomenon with a online concert, presenting a meaningful day to ARMY with the internet concert and the 'Special Stage Cam' that recorded it all.
title: BTS Memories of 2020
